Manages game input, the game window and the output displayed.

Initializes the game and runs the window method.

Graphic - Class in gametools
Combines the area and animation classes into one object.
Graphic() - Constructor for class gametools.Graphic
Creates a blank graphic without an image or position.
Graphic(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class gametools.Graphic
Creates a graphic in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom image.
Graphic(Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Graphic
Creates a graphic in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
Graphic(Graphic) - Constructor for class gametools.Graphic
Creates an exact copy of the passed in graphic.
Graphic(Position, Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Graphic
Creates a graphic at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
Group - Class in gametools
Class for managing and updating groups of sprites.
